name: Doughnut Clicker (Macjja)
description:
This is an amazing, unique experience that is called Cook- I mean, Doughnut Clicker!

In this game, you can click on doughnuts to get donut balls, which you can then use to buy things that will get you even more donut balls!

This game is the first I made, just to show to yall and myself that I can make a video game.
